zh: 产品 B：一致性中的差异化
en: Product B: Consistency with Variation

zh: 第二款产品如何在保持品牌一致性的同时实现差异化。
en: How the second product achieves differentiation while maintaining brand consistency.

zh: 在已有品牌系统与首款产品的基础上，第二款产品的设计重点不再是「从零开始」，而是如何在保持一致性的同时，做出合理变化。
en: Building on the existing brand system and first product, the second product's design focus is no longer 'starting from zero', but how to make reasonable changes while maintaining consistency.

zh: 对照是判断差异最直接的方式
en: Comparison is the most direct way to judge differences

zh: 两款产品在视觉结构、比例与核心语言上保持一致，但在细节层面根据产品特性进行调整。
en: The two products maintain consistency in visual structure, proportion, and core language, while adjusting details according to product characteristics.

zh: 差异化是被系统允许的变化
en: Differentiation is change permitted by the system

zh: 核心组件保持一致的设计语言
en: Core components maintain consistent design language

zh: 从主体结构到细节配件，设计遵循同一套视觉逻辑与比例原则。
en: From main structure to detail components, design follows the same visual logic and proportion principles.

zh: 一致性从组件层面开始建立
en: Consistency starts from the component level

zh: 系统化的设计交付
en: Systematic design delivery

zh: 完整的设计规范与文档确保设计意图能够被准确执行。
en: Complete design specifications and documentation ensure design intent can be accurately executed.

zh: 设计不止于图像，更在于规范
en: Design goes beyond images, it's about specifications

zh: 产品细节与材质表现
en: Product details and material expression

zh: 通过不同角度与特写展示产品的工艺细节与质感处理。
en: Showcasing product craftsmanship details and texture treatment through different angles and close-ups.

zh: 细节决定品质感知
en: Details determine quality perception

zh: 产品视觉的完整呈现
en: Complete visual presentation of the product

zh: 从局部到整体，展示产品设计的完整视觉逻辑。
en: From parts to whole, showing the complete visual logic of product design.

zh: 整体感来自每个局部的一致
en: The overall sense comes from consistency in every part

zh: 多场景下的产品表现
en: Product performance in multiple scenarios

zh: 产品在不同使用场景与展示方式下保持一致的品牌识别。
en: Products maintain consistent brand recognition across different usage scenarios and display methods.

zh: 场景变化，识别不变
en: Scenarios change, recognition remains

zh: 设计规范的系统化文档
en: Systematic documentation of design specifications

zh: 完整的设计指南确保品牌在任何触点都能被一致表达。
en: Complete design guidelines ensure the brand can be consistently expressed at any touchpoint.

zh: 规范是一致性的保障
en: Specifications are the guarantee of consistency

zh: 品牌延展与应用示例
en: Brand extension and application examples

zh: 从产品到传播物料，品牌视觉在各类媒介中保持统一。
en: From products to communication materials, brand visuals maintain consistency across various media.

zh: 延展不是复制，是系统的自然生长
en: Extension is not copying, it's the natural growth of the system

zh: Product B 验证了品牌系统的可持续性
en: Product B validates the sustainability of the brand system

zh: 这一阶段的完成标志着品牌进入可复制扩展的成熟阶段。
en: The completion of this phase marks the brand entering a mature stage of replicable expansion.
